product_name: COSRXLow pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingThis COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser is an ultra-gentle face wash formulated with pore-purifying ingredients that gently rinse away impurities.
details: DetailsBenefitsRestores skin's optimal pH levelsDeeply cleanses the skin of pollutants, dirt, and oilControls oil and reduces the appearance of poresSoftens skin texture without irritating the skinpH: 5.3-6.3Key IngredientsTea Tree Oil: Keeps pores clear with antibacterial propertiesBeta Hydroxy Acid: Dissolves pore-clogging dead skin and sebumPrimrose Oil: Softens, hydrates, and nourishes the skinFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesAlcoholItem 2517358How To UseUse morning and night after removing makeup. Squeeze a proper amount onto the hands and gently massage the cleanser onto damp skin, avoiding the eye and mouth area. Rinse with warm water and follow with toner.Tip:To remove heavy makeup, first use a makeup remover, cleansing oil, or cleansing balm. Follow with Low pH Good Morning Cleanser to remove leftover residueThe Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser can also be used as a body washIngredientsWater, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Polysorbate 20, Styrax Japonicus Branch/fruit/leaf Extract, Butylene Glycol, Saccharomyces Ferment, Cryptomeria Japonica Leaf Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Leaf Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Oenothera Biennis (evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Allantoin, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Betaine Salicylate, Citric Acid, Ethyl Hexanediol, 1,2-hexanediol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Benzoate, Disodium EDTA.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use morning and night after removing makeup. Squeeze a proper amount onto the hands and gently massage the cleanser onto damp skin, avoiding the eye and mouth area. Rinse with warm water and follow with toner.Tip:To remove heavy makeup, first use a makeup remover, cleansing oil, or cleansing balm. Follow with Low pH Good Morning Cleanser to remove leftover residueThe Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser can also be used as a body wash

reviews.headline: Caused Me Months of Breakouts + Irritation
reviews.comments:
Let me preface this review by stating that I like Corsrx as a brand and have had success with many of their other products in the past. I first tried them out back in 2015 when they were only available for purchase through a few Korean skin care importers such as Soko Glam ect. and thus I felt some level of confidence when picking out this cleanser. 

I have dry/combination skin that tends to lean on the sensitive side, but nothing about this cleanser gave me any indication that it would irritate my skin. Within a week or so my skin started to feel dry and my overall skin texture started to worsen. I started to get small white heads all over my forehead and hairline, and eventually started to get cystic breakouts on my forehead as well. At the time I attributed this to stress and poor diet, but even after making significant changes in an attempt to improve my skin nothing was changing. I have always had relatively clear skin and when I do breakout it's almost always hormonal and pops up around my period. This was very different. The breakouts were near constant and my skin seemingly worsened no matter what I tried externally or internally. 

About a week ago I started to really reflect on my routine, products, and any lifestyle changes that could have been causing my breakouts. I was exhausted and frustrated and was even considering seeing a doctor to see if I was suffering from some kind of hormone imbalance. I had a gut feeling that this cleanser could be the root cause of my problems, and immediately threw it away and purchased the cleanser I was using prior to this one. In a matter of DAYS it became abundantly clear to me that my gut instinct was correct. My active breakouts started to clear up. The painful cystic spot on the middle of my forehead has shrunk by nearly 80%. The scarring from old breakouts over the months have started to fade. I have had no new white heads pop up. My skin feels HYDRATED again. This cleanser may work for some people, but after reading other reviews it seems to me that if you have dry, sensitive, or even combination skin you need to stay away from this. I have never had a product cause my skin to react this way and I only wish I would have realized it sooner.

reviews.headline: Love this brand
reviews.comments:
2nd buy on this,
Nice for morning wash, not heavy nor stripping for a fash wash.

reviews.headline: Every day go-to cleanser
reviews.comments: I use this product morning and night and it feels amazing on my dry-prone skin. It feels light and clean on skin without causing dry skin after usage. It's simplified my skin care routine and I realized my problem was too many products. This is one and done cleanser.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Feels amazing! I'm really happy

reviews.headline: Clean
reviews.comments: It leaves you feeling clean! My skin feels ready and prepped for the rest of my skin care after using this cleanser.  You definitely should still follow up with other skin care like the toner or moisturizer because it could leave your skin feeling dry. Don't just only cleanse.

reviews.headline: Fav everyday cleanser!
reviews.comments: My go to cleanser! I have normal/dry skin and I can use this night and day, it doesnt feel striping after use. It feels really gentle on the skin and my friends use it on sleepovers and bought it themselves. I have used this product for over a year now 10/10!

reviews.headline: love it
reviews.comments: I bought this cleanser because the one I had been using for years (The Body Shop tea tree cleanser) is no longer availble. I liked that this also had tea tree in its ingredients. The smell is refreshing. I love that my skin doesn't feel stripped after using, however I have been experiencing some dryness (nothing a hydrating serum can't fix). I experienced some purging for about 2 weeks due to the BHA, but now my skin is beautifully clear!

reviews.headline: I love it works really well
reviews.comments: I will buy this agian

reviews.headline: The right one for me
reviews.comments: It is better than many expensive cleansers, and while I can't state it solved my acne and postacne problem, I can confidently say it's been part of the routine that solved it. Initially I thought the smell was weird, but I got used to it

reviews.headline: It gets the job done
reviews.comments: Cleans well, and feels noce on skin. However the smell is so over powering when washing my face. I almost tradhed the product bc of the smell, but I didnt want to waste money. So Im going to use it till its gone. Bit its going to be tough.

reviews.headline: Genuinely amazing
reviews.comments: ive struggled with acne my entire life, and let me tell you this cleanser was a game changer. everyones skin is different, so what works for me is not gonna worm for everyone, but I had acne and acne scars that looked a million times less red and inflamed after using this wash just once. I use it night (i know its meant for morning) AFTER removing my makeup with micellar water, i wouldn't recommend just cleansing your face with this, make sure you get all the makeup off first. it leaves my skin feeling smooth, evens out the tone, and has seriously reduced acne so well. i highly recommend giving it a try if youve had persistent, full face acne.

reviews.headline: Not for combination/dry skin
reviews.comments: I have combination but more leaning to dry skin and this cleanser did not work for me. It made my skin so dry and felt stripped, it also broke me out

reviews.headline: Not for me!!!
reviews.comments: Had very high expectations for this brand. But ever since I started using this, I had break outs (I never have breakouts) and feels my skin has been stripped. I have combination skin just fyi for the girls that are looking to try this.

reviews.headline: It smells so bad
reviews.comments: I used this product once the smell was too overwhelming and making me gag. It smells like pesticides you put on your garden. Maybe this product really does work but i couldnt get passed the smell.

reviews.headline: LOVE this product!
reviews.comments: It makes me skin feel sooo clean! And gets rid of any acne inflammation! It does have a strong tea tree smell and can be drying if used twice a day!

reviews.headline: I wanted to like it butâ€¦.
reviews.comments: The tea tree smell is strong but i personally find it soothing. I love cosrx and their snail mucin cleanser and decided to give this a try, i didn't want to believe the reviews but this breaks you out baaad. I can use every product under the sun and my skin has never gotten irritated or broke out but this broke me out on my chin bad and my sister on her cheeks. I think I'm going to throw it away out give it away.

reviews.headline: Don't use this if you have dry skin.
reviews.comments: I actally love the smell of this product. (Tea tree oil). It doesn't bother me but the actual product is incredibly stripping to the skin and I have oily skin which this product got rid of but now my skin is flaky due to the dryness that it has caused. I would recomend this to be used with an oily cleanser and not as a daily morning and night cleanser.

reviews.headline: i don't like it
reviews.comments: my skin was getting clear before i used this. after i used it i broke out on my cheeks on the left and right side of my chin area as well as my forehead. the tea tree smell is really strong too. if you want a good cleanser get the snail mucin cleanser

reviews.headline: Yucky Smell
reviews.comments: Idk if I got a wonky batch or something, but this smelled awful. Like mildew. It was a bummer, because the few times that I powered through the off-putting smell, it felt nice on my skin and didn't dry it out.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: I don't normally write reviews, but I was repurchasing this for the fourth time so I might as well. The first time I used this I really enjoyed it. Great in the morning, refreshing, not drying, gentle but cleansing. Also works at night when double cleansing with a cleansing oil. Never broke me out, could always use it even when my skin was freaking out. After I used it up I got another cleanser, but went back to this when I realized don't need to fix what's not broken. Does exactly what you want from a cleanser.

media.headline: The only face wash I'll use from now on
media.caption: The best TBH

faceoff_positive.comments: Skin 'profile':  aged, reaction prone/allergic, oily/dehydrated, with  2 medical skin conditions that this does not irritate.  IMO, it is suitable for all skin types.  Cosdna ingredients list is totally clean.  If you want in depth info on this product, intragoogle it on Snow White and the Asian Pear, which fully tests/compares/ evaluates AB/KB products.  Cleansers wash away, fact.  The bha in this is not sufficient to exfoliate...but it does restore the acid mantle, so that the rest of the routine is most effective.  Your exfoliation comes from the leave-on products, like Cosrx blackhead power liquid. (Available on Ulta.) This cleanses effectively without stripping, leaves no residue, and softens mildly.  Its core benefit is as a phenomenal prep for other products.  Cosrx tends to be consonant with 'Paula principles,' that is no irritating fragrance and no alcohol.  The 'Good morning' does not mean it is only an AM cleanser, but you will wish to use micellar or oil cleanse for the m/u at night.  Just received a 24 piece anniversary goody bag.  None of the cleansers (Bliss, Badescue, Dermalogica) remotely compare to the Cosrx.  Another key point is that the size lasts forever, so it is incredibly cost effective.  If you are adventurous or easily bored with skincare, and want to be on to the next best thing, this may be too much product for you. My first tube was from Memebox, which Ulta is now partially representing, and I had to get the second tube elsewhere online...but Ulta listens (I have touted this product in other user reviews) and now carries this first rate and cost effective product. Thrilled that Ulta is expanding Cosrx.  This will be a forever repurchase.
faceoff_positive.headline: Ultimate HG cleanser

faceoff_negative.comments: I was really excited to try this cleanser after I researched the ingredients, and I gave it the stars I did because of all the good ingredients, but I've found myself very disappointed with the result. When I used this for the first week, i found my skin feeling uncomfortable (a little bit stripped in a way that felt sticky, but when i touched my skin it felt soft and clean) until I used my toner. The next week I started to feel my skin getting drier and drier in my t zone, mainly on my cheeks near my nose and in between my eye brows. Most recently, when I used the cleanser before a clay mask, I had a severe reaction and those areas completely dried out. That made me decide to stop using the cleanser. This cleanser also lathers very intensely and at times is even foaming, which I didn't expect. I think this contributes to the drying and it makes washing the cleanser off very difficult. With more moisturizing cleansers I'm able to use a good amount and be able to wash it off just fine, but with this even when I used less pea sized amount it took me a very long time to get rid of all of the bubbles.
faceoff_negative.headline: Dried My Skin Out

rollup.name: Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser
